word_mean: 硅藻，矽藻：指细胞壁有硅的单细胞微型藻，属于硅藻科。有几种是有毒的，可造成“红潮”。还有很多其他骨硅化石是从沉积物中提取的，可用来作滤器与磨蚀剂，见earth项下的infusorial earth

sentence.Network_en: Delegates closely felt the glamor of DAJINY Diatom Ooze Coating.
sentence.Network_cn: 代表们在会场亲身感受了“大津泥”硅藻墙面的独特魅力.

sentence.Network_en: Assume that atmosphere is made of diatom ideal gas in adiabatic equilibrium.
sentence.Network_cn: 大气可看成绝热平衡下的双原子理想气体.

sentence.Network_en: The food composition consisted of eight groups: diatom, protozoa, spongiaria, annelida, mollusca, crustacea, echinodermata and pisces.
sentence.Network_cn: 其食物组成有8大类: 硅藻类 、 原生动物 、 海绵动物 、 环节动物 、 软体动物 、 甲壳动物 、 棘皮动物及鱼类.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin Diatoma (genus name), from Greek diatomos 'cut in two', from diatemnein 'to cut through'

means.word_mean: 1. microscopic unicellular marine or freshwater colonial alga having cell walls impregnated with silica
